B

Button - Class in com.gea.gui
This Button class represents a button that shows text and can react to mouseclicks.
You can manipulate properties of instances of this class, like font, text, position, width and height.
You can also store other necessary information for response to mousclick by adding, updating and retrieving stored information.
Button() - Constructor for class com.gea.gui.Button
HAS TO BE AFTER-INITIALIZED Sets the position to an empty position object Sets width and height to 0
Button(String) - Constructor for class com.gea.gui.Button
HAS TO BE AFTER-INITIALIZED
Sets the position to an empty position object
Sets width and height to 0
Sets text to given text
Button(Vector2f, int, int) - Constructor for class com.gea.gui.Button
 
Button(Vector2f, int, int, String) - Constructor for class com.gea.gui.Button
 
ButtonTest - Class in com.gea.test.gui
